attributes.action: The Government to retrain the Armed Forces made redundant due to recent cuts as a Border Force.
attributes.additional_details:
Our borders are unsafe and open to non-desirables to abuse the welfare system and the security of the United Kingdom.
The Government should re-seal the Borders and protect the UK, by retraining and re-hiring the Armed Forces Personnel made redundant in the new 'cuts'.
It would be a serious loss of the talent these people have if not used in this way, especially in these difficult times. Also, it would ensure they remain in employment which will save money in benefits they may need, to re-settle into normal society.
